= Track =
== Introduction ==
A KLT tracker.

= Tracker =
== Introduction ==
  * Tracker is a point tracker tool that takes images as input and gives point tracks with matches as output. It saves all results into a .txt file. 

== Limitations ==
  * Images must be radially corrected.
